author: Cara Lombardo
title: Pfizer Revenue Growth Stalls

organizations.name: pfizer revenue growth stalls pfizer inc.

text:
Pfizer Inc.â€™s revenue was little changed in its latest quarter as the pharmaceutical company examines the future of its consumer-health business.
Pfizer said Tuesday its first-quarter revenue increased 1% from a year ago to $12.91 billion, less than the $13.13 billion analysts expected. Revenue increased in its innovative health unit, which is slightly more than half the business and includes its consumer-health brands such as Advil, Chapstick and Centrum vitamins.
